item.title: Contact
item.description: I’m always happy to receive correspondence, so please reach out if you’re interested in collaborating or have questions about my work. My email is thabbott [at] mit [dot] edu. google scholar | github

item.title: In the media
item.description: In the media Coverage of work with Tim Cronin on aerosol impacts on convection: MIT news, phys.org, physicsworld, Radio-Canada (French) Coverage of work with Henri Drake, Zeke Hausfather, and Gavin Schmidt on evaluating past climate model projections: EAPS news, Berkeley News, Gizmodo, Science, CBS, Mashable, Scientific American, Vox, Washington Post. Coverage of the RELAMPAGO-CACTI field campaign: The Verge used a timelapse I made while in Argentina as part of the NCAR Advanced Study Institute.
